testsuite.name: Follow a user
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Follow a user
--Output from Follow user-- Scenario: Follow user # FollowUser.feature:3 Given I am logged in as "user2" and at the home page # FollowUser_steps.groovy:4 When I click follow "user1" # FollowUser_steps.groovy:10 Then I should see "user1" in the list of followed users in my profile # FollowUser_steps.groovy:14

testsuite.name: Like a post
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Like a post
--Output from Like a Post-- Scenario: Like a Post # LikePost.feature:3 Given I am logged in and at the home page # NewPost_steps.groovy:4 When I like the post "i am user2 guys hehehe" # LikePost_steps.groovy:11 Then I should see "user1 liked this" on the post # LikePost_steps.groovy:15

testsuite.name: List Posts
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: List Posts
--Output from See all posts-- Scenario: See all posts # ListPost.feature:4 Given I am logged in # ListPost_steps.groovy:6 When I am at the home page # ListPost_steps.groovy:14 Then I should see all the posts # ListPost_steps.groovy:17

testsuite.name: Logging out
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Logging out
--Output from Log out-- Scenario: Log out # Logout.feature:5 Given I am at the home page and logged in as "user1" # Logout_steps.groovy:7 When I click the logout button # Logout_steps.groovy:12 Then I should be redirected to the login page # Logout_steps.groovy:15

testsuite.name: Posting new post
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Posting new post
--Output from New Post-- Scenario: New Post # NewPost.feature:4 Given I am logged in and at the home page # NewPost_steps.groovy:4 When I write "This is a new post" in the text area and click post # NewPost_steps.groovy:10 Then I should see "This is a new post" in the list of posts # NewPost_steps.groovy:15

testsuite.name: logging in
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: logging in
--Output from Logging in-- Scenario: Logging in # Login.feature:3 Given I am at the login page # Login_steps.groovy:8 When I type "user1" in the username field and "password" in the password field and login # Login_steps.groovy:13 Then I should be able to see "user1" at the home page # Login_steps.groovy:16
